name: Asteroid Dodger (Ohm Alone #1)
description:
Your ship has crashed in the asteroid belt and you are stranded.

You must now use just your EVA suit thrusters to escape through the asteroid belt to the rescue ship, good luck.

Controls:

W - Thrust forward

S - Thrust backward

A - Rotate left

D - Rotate right

Q -Thrust left

E - Thrust right

Made as part of the Ohm Alone game jam #1.
